page.title: 08A DAY IN THE LIFE OF CARRIE
page.content: The worlds noisiest alarm clock woke me up at 8.00 am.I sleepily turned it off.When I had got changed and got washed I went downstairs to have some coco pops.In the newspaper I looked to see if anything was on television only Pigeon Street so I went into my bedroom to play.Then I went out again because I did not want to play anything. Later on I had to go to the shop for mum.She said I could have a bag of sweets to eat.On the way I stopped at the scarlet postbox to post a letter that mum gave me. On the way back I decided to ask Helen to go to the Green.When I got home I called for her.Helen could play. So we walked together. Half an hour later I was having my dinner.I fell asleep on my beanbag.After playing with Helen it had been a busy day!
